mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS( COMMENT_USER_ID, COMMENT_TXT, BOARD_NUM, COMMENT_CLASS, COMMENT_ORDER, GROUP_NUM ) VALUE( #{comment_user_id}, #{comment_txt}, #{board_num}, 0, 0, #{board_num} );
mapper.select: SELECT C.COMENT_NUM, C.COMMENT_USER_ID, M.USER_NAME, C.COMMENT_TXT, C.BOARD_NUM, C.COMMENT_CLASS, C.COMMENT_ORDER, C.GROUP_NUM FROM COMMENTS C LEFT JOIN MEMBERS M ON M.USER_ID = C.COMMENT_USER_ID WHERE C.BOARD_NUM = #{board_num}
